task_description: Search for a song on Kugou Music using the search bar.
Explore song recommendations within Kugou Music.
Listen to live music streaming on Kugou Music.
Sing along with karaoke tracks available in Kugou Music.
Tune into a radio station in Kugou Music.
Create a new playlist within Kugou Music and add songs to it.
Watch a music video on Kugou Music and explore related videos.
View trending songs and albums in Kugou Music.
Interact with a live stream feature in Kugou Music.
Discover curated playlists and add them to your collection on Kugou Music.
